title: Fruit Basket And Cover, 1890–1910
markings: Impressed into white strip on base: "BELLEEK CO FERMANAGH"
provenance:
Suzanne Todd [1]; 2011: acquired by Museum (via Gregory Todd) 











[1] Owned by the aunt of the donor, who was born in Ireland, but married the donor's uncle in Indiana in about 1910. She left it to the present owner.
creditline: Gift of Suzanne W. Todd in Memory of William & Beatrice Votaw
description: Oval form, with pierced latticework body, the rim and cover encrusted with flowers, clovers, and thistles, with branch-form handles at the ends.

tombstone.epitaph: Fruit Basket And Cover, 1890–1910. Glazed porcelain. Gift of Suzanne W. Todd in Memory of William & Beatrice Votaw. 2011-37-1-a,b.
